snippet: The 49th annual Academy of Country Music Awards on Sunday night split the difference between young and old.
abstract: Young and old country music stars are equally represented at 49th annual Academy of Country Music Awards.
lead_paragraph: The 49th annual Academy of Country Music Awards on Sunday night split the difference between young and old.

headline.print_headline: Country Music Awards Nod to Young and Old
headline.main: Country Music Awards Nod to Young and Old
